title: Commentary on Jordan Peterson's Bib Series 4c, the awakening of consciousness as universal calamity?
description:
The lack of physical evidence for what Western Christian doctrine calls "The Fall" causes skepticism and doubt in the Bible. Jordan Peterson's "being" relating to consciousness is an interesting theory tying the two together. 

Going old school with the Biblical Series Commentary. This time on Bib Ser 4 https://youtu.be/Ifi5KkXig3s 

No fancy this time, just watching through and commenting on what I've learned so far from Peterson.
